projects.title: libev3min
projects.author: TatranskiDravci
projects.description: Minimalist open-source library for EV3 LEGO robots, used during First Lego League Challenge nationals in Slovakia.

sections.title: Teamwork & efficiency
sections.para: This library was developed in-between regionals and nationals, in a particularly short period of time, allowing for only a disproportionately small tolerance for error and a simple specification, so that it could be efficiently leveraged by any member of the team.

projects.title: vis3dvf
projects.author: LukasDrsman
projects.description: Time-dependent R^3 vector field visualizer module.

sections.title: Personalization
sections.para: Sometimes, widely available tools may simply be either too complex, inaccessible, or not cut out for the job. At the time of developing this minimal vector field plotter, I was attempting to visualize the radiative component of electric field for a rotating charge (as in a synchrotron). To fully grasp the physical implications, a 2D cross-section of a specific time simply was not enough, thus leading me to graphics programming.
